attributes.action: More help for single people on a low wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give more financial help to people who work but earn low wages and have no children, not disabled, working and from the UK, enabling them to be able to get a place of their own and live.

rejection.details: Please make your title a specific call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
